pullrequest.title: Adapt sdformat to debian packaging policy

content.raw:
Sorry for the double post.

I double checked.
Starting from Ubuntu 11.04, Multiarch is supported:
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MultiarchSpec

```
Ubuntu 11.04 introduces support for installing packages from multiple architectures on a single system. This makes a wider array of 32-bit applications available to users of 64-bit Ubuntu.
```
content.html:
Sorry for the double post.

I double checked. Starting from Ubuntu 11.04, Multiarch is supported: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MultiarchSpec

Ubuntu 11.04 introduces support for installing packages from multiple architectures on a single system. This makes a wider array of 32-bit applications available to users of 64-bit Ubuntu.
